ext_description.p: A Physical_unit_planar_keepout_shape is a type of and a type of . A Physical_unit_planar_keepout_shape is the projected shape of a keepout region around the in two dimensions.
ext_description.note: Keepout regions typically include some minimal spacing around the extreme shape represented by where the exact relationship between the two shapes is unrecorded.

There may be multiple Physical_unit_planar_keepout_shape for a particular purpose. The recommended method to aggregate several Physical_unit_planar_keepout_shape that together describe a volumetric constraint is to reference them from a member of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the shape_location_with_respect_to_seating_plane specifies the of the Physical_unit_planar_keepout_shape as 'above', 'below' or 'congruent' with the .

the shape_distance_from_seating_plane specifies the that is distance of the Physical_unit_planar_keepout_shape from the . The shape_distance_from_seating_plane is coordinated with the shape_location_with_respect_to_seating_plane. The value of this attribute need not be provided.
If the shape_location_with_respect_to_seating_plane value is 'congruent', the shape_distance_from_seating_plane shall not be supplied.

ext_description.p: A Physical_unit_planar_shape is a type of . A Physical_unit_planar_shape is the projected shape of the in two dimensions. A Physical_unit_planar_shape shall not reference a .
ext_description.note: When a extreme boundary of the actual shape is provided, static mass property calculations based on the extreme shape may be invalid, depending on the purpose.
The shape of the is the shape for a that references that , eliminating the requirement to provide a shape for a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the shape_purpose specifies the as a or an .
the shape_location_with_respect_to_seating_plane specifies the of the Physical_unit_planar_shape as above, below or congruent with the .

the shape_distance_from_seating_plane specifies that is the distance of the Physical_unit_planar_shape from the . The shape_distance_from_seating_plane is coordinated with the shape_location_with_respect_to_seating_plane. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
